title: sahisalArena gOpi
sahitya:
sahisalArena gOpi ninna magana lUTi Enendu pELamma


anupallavi

  vASudEvanu bandu mOsadindali enna vAsava seLa koNDu Odi pOdanamma


caraNam 1    dEvara peTTige tegedu shAlagrAma sAvira nunguvane bhAvajanayya 
idEnendare nimma kAva dEvaru nA kELikO embane
    caraNam 2    agryOdaka tandu jagali mEliTTare veggaLadali kuDiva mangaLa 
mahimana mIsalendare nimma mangaLa mahimana appa nAnembana
    caraNam 3    aTTaDugeyanella ucciSTa mADi aSTu tA bhaLidumbane krSNadEvara 
naivEdyavendare nimma iSTa dEvaru triptanAdanendembane
    caraNam 4    rtuvAda bAleyaru patiyoDege pOpAga pathadoLagaDagiruva mati keTTa 
heNNe sungava koDu enutali ratiyinda mAnava sUrEkombuvane
    caraNam 5    acca pAl mosaru navanItavu majjige racci mADi kuDiva svaccha shrI 
purandara viTTala rAyana iccheyindali ninna manege karedu koLLe
